meanings.definition: (まれ) 頭蓋骨が2つに分かれている
meanings.english_definition: (rare) Having a skull divided into two parts.

etymology.value: From dis- (apart, asunder) + pericranium (the membrane closely investing the skull) + -ate (having).

usage_notes.explanation: This is a very rare and technical term, primarily used in medical or anatomical contexts.
